p: Furthermore, some physicians administer corticosteroids, the evidence of which in terms of clinical outcomes and complications/death prevention is moderate according to the Cochrane reviews. In a systematic review of the treatment effects of candidate drugs against SARS-CoV, 25 out of 29 studies assessed mentioning steroid, its use was found to be inconclusive, with four of them showing potential harm to patientsâ€™ health [ 23]. Similarly, the effectiveness of antibiotics in the treatment of viral pneumonia appears to be limited [ 2].
